message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something a bit lower. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,500 is a tempting offer, I know the true value of this product. Could you do $13,500?
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
